comments:
Transcript from conversation on buckminster newsgroup:

Hi Robert,
This is a long short really, but are you by any chance running without the Buckminster pde support?

Regards,
Thomas Hallgren

Robert Dale wrote:
> It happens every time.  Although I forgot to mention that the error actually occurs when pressing any of the three buttons:
> 'Resolve to Wizard'  'Resolve and Materialize'  'External Save As'
>
> Checking 'Continue on error' has no effect.
>
> The end result is only the error.  No other events happen.
>
> "Thomas Hallgren" <thomas@tada.se> wrote in message news:f4p6kk$l59$1@build.eclipse.org...
>> Hi Robert,
>> I'm trying the same query on my machine but I have no problems with it. Is this intermittent in any way or does it happen every time?
>>
>> Regards,
>> Thomas Hallgren
>>
>> Robert Dale wrote:

So I went to manage configuration and did not see Buckminster PDE support listed.
Then I went to find new features for buckminster.  It did not list PDE support
with auto select mirrors turned on.  So I tried the buckminster update site directly
and there it was!  I guess for some reason mirrors aren't picking up PDE support??

All is good again.

Thanks.
